servinfo.title: Steering wheel feels heavy momentarily when turning it to the left or right

condition.ptxt: Steering wheel feels heavy momentarily when turning it to the left or right

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in due to insufficient amount of fluid

action.ptxt: Adjust belt tension or replace belt as necessary.

ps.ptxt: P/S pump hydraulic pressure fails to increase

action.ptxt: Check pressure and repair or replace defective part.

ps.ptxt: P/S pump hydraulic pressure increases but slowly

action.ptxt: Check pressure and repair or replace defective part.
